content: gauge using bulky yarn using the c2c stitch 4 squares = 5 inches gauge usine medium weight yarn using c2c stitch 3 squares = 2 inches if you are new to corner to corner c2c crochet i have provided video tutorials to teach you this beautiful stitch this is a wonderful pattern to practice the c2c increase stitch it does not require to you decrease and the final row gives the shawl a flat edge on the top side i have provided two patterns one for chunky yarn and one for worsted weight yarn enjoy
